item.title: Is now a good time to invest in Japan?
item.description: Japan is set to appoint its first ever female prime minister this week. Is now a good time to invest in Japanese stocks and investment trusts?

item.title: David Ellison: America's new media mogul
item.description: David Ellison is building a mighty new force in old and new media. Critics worry that he will prove to be a Trumpian patsy. Is that fair?
